sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; export default function Terms() { return (

Terms & Conditions

By accessing this website, you agree to the following terms and conditions.

1. Use of Content

All live scores, stats, and content on this site are provided for informational purposes only. You may not redistribute or republish our content without written permission.

2. Accuracy of Data

While we strive to provide accurate and real-time cricket data, we do not guarantee the completeness or accuracy of all content.

3. Ads and Affiliates

This site may display ads and contain affiliate links. We are not responsible for content or policies on third-party websites.

4. Changes

We may update these terms at any time. Continued use of the site means you accept the updated terms.

If you have questions about these terms, contact us at support@livecricketscores.com

); }
